text: Ebrahim Amini (30 June 1925 â€“ April 24, 2020) was an Iranian politician. He was a member of the Assembly of Experts from 1983 to 2007 and again from 2016 to 2020. He was also a member of the Expediency Discernment Council. He was a possible candidate to become the next Iranian Supreme Leader. Amini was known as a critic of the government of former president Mahmoud Ahmedinejad. Amini died at a hospital on April 24, 2020 in Qom, Iran at the age of 94.Ayatollah Ibrahim Amini Passes Away at 94 ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Iranian politicians
title: Ebrahim Amini
